titleStmt.title: The Bishop of Canterbvry, his confession wherein is declared his constant resolution, his plots and indeavours to intraduce popery into England, and to advance the Roman Catholic religion : being from his owne hand, sent and directed to the Popes Holinesse : expressing to his Holinesse his sorrow for the unhappy successe, and failing of all his labours and endeavours for the advancement of popery.
titleStmt.author: Laud, William, 1573-1645.

notesStmt.note: Signed: William Land, Arch-Bishop of Canterbury.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
